Summary: two stars over indiana, observed from ohio border
trends: There has been one other sighting in Harrison
There were no other sightings in Harrison on or around November 30th 1984
divs: Sighting Details was outside after dark, dry fork rd. nearharrison, oh. bright ruby red light flash, filled eyes. two stars over indiana.went in, got witness two andhis 5 children. red flash again after he said i wascrazy. observed for 10minutes. two air force fighters came from behind, overI-275, at treetoplevel,(loud!) booking for the lights. small overcab-wingspotter followed inbetween space of jets. left light took off up 45 deg.angle,left light trail like a meteor. right light dimmer than left, got bright,moved,dimmed, bright, moved, dim, then bright and shot off opposite diectionlike ameteor. jets split up in pursuit, but they were way outclassed. spotterplane kept going straight to original spot, he was outclassed by all aircraftinvolved (like, he was left standing still. witness two now a beliver, thereswild stuff goes on in the night!
